title: The Mitochondrial Method: Rewire Your Energy from the Cell Up
premise: Modern fatigue isn't a character flaw—it's a cellular crisis. This book translates cutting-edge mitochondrial science into a practical, four-phase protocol that teaches readers to optimize their body's fundamental energy factories, turning persistent exhaustion into sustained vitality with clinically-backed lifestyle interventions.
protagonist: The Reader, guided as a proactive 'Cellular Architect' of their own health.
conflict: The central struggle is against the modern environment—processed foods, circadian disruption, chronic stress, and sedentary habits—that silently damages mitochondrial function, leading to a pervasive energy deficit that willpower alone cannot fix.
setting: Present day, applying the science within the reader's own daily life, home, and routines.
tone: Empowering, rigorously scientific yet accessible, and solution-oriented.
